DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to determine the effect of epinephrine on systemic absorption of local anaesthetic mepivacaine administered for brachial plexus block in uremic patients scheduled for creation or repair of an arteriovenous fistula. Furthermore, an impact of epinephrine on the central circulation and peripheral tissue oxygenation will be evaluated.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Epinephrine on Systemic Absorption of Mepivacaine in Uremic Patients
DOC.criteria: patient acceptance of regional anaesthesia peripheral arteriosclerosis diabetes mellitus bleeding disorder infection at the puncture site allergy to mepivacaine pregnancy
